entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 40 gusting to 70 early this evening then northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
